author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: DAO Token Market
description: DAO Net provides rapid sustainable funding for DeFi teams however deploying DAO Net will require a market for DAO tokens.
solution: Integrate with DAO Tokens with existing DEX and Automated Market Makers to facilitate the exchange of DAO Tokens for ADA.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
